description:
Treat your gravel bike to an upgrade. Slick conditions are where Diamond bar tape thrives. Designed with large prominent texturing, this bar tape adds the right kinds of friction to your cockpit, so not matter how greasy the trails get, you stay connected.

  • Aggressive texture keeps you connected in all riding conditions
  • 3mm-thick tape with a gel layer absorbs and dampens road vibration
  • Expanding bar end plugs included
name: MEC Diamond Handlebar Tape
